bayes

Class BNDataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.BNDataGenerator

  • public class BNDataGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for generating a data set from a learned Bayesian Network.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

      Constructor and Description
      BNDataGenerator()

    • Constructor Detail

      • BNDataGenerator

        public BNDataGenerator()

    • Method Detail

      • generateDataSet

        public static DataSet generateDataSet(BayesianNetwork net,
                      int numInstances)
        This method produces an artificial data set generated from a Bayesian network.
        Parameters:
        net - the Bayesian network used to generate the data set
        numInstances - the number of instances to be generated
        Returns:
        an artificial data set

      • setAttrInstance

        private static void setAttrInstance(BNNode node,
                   Instance instance)
        Given a node and an instance under construction, consider the value of the parent attributes that have already been picked for this instance. Choose the value for the specified node's attribute based on the values of the values of these parent attributes in the instance.
        Parameters:
        node - the current node for which we need to pick a value to assign to the instance
        instance - the instance for which we need to assign the value of the specified node's attribute. This instance MUST have values for the node's parent attributes in the network. If this is not the case, this method will throw an exception.

      • pickRandomValue

        public static java.lang.Double pickRandomValue(java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> valueProbabilities)
        Picks a nominal value for some attribute from a probability distribution.
        Parameters:
        valueProbabilities - a mapping of nominal value ID's to probabilities of picking that nominal value
        Returns:
        the nominal value ID chosen randomly from the given probability distribution
